summary.p: Sends Bullinger a calf; he will inform him of the costs as soon as he comes [to Zurich].

div.p: Honorable, faithful, dear godfather, at your request I am sending you a calf. I have inquired about it from a neighbor. God willing, it will be convenient for you at this time. However, I have not been able to travel; because (therefore), since they are now rare, I sent it as soon as I received it. Therefore, accept my service in the best way and commend it to God. When I come to you, I will tell you what it costs.
To the well-learned, honorable Master Heinrich Bullinger, preacher in Zurich, my dear lord and godfather.
